title: Chin Zotung - John (Print)
description: Chin Zotung translation of the Gospel of John. Zotung is a language spoken by the Zotung people, in Rezua Township, Chin State, Burma. It is a continuum of closely related dialects and accents. The language does not have a standard written form since it has dialects with multiple variations on its pronunciations.

language.name: Zotung Chin
language.area: Chin Hills, South of Haka Township.
